segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a huge mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate that she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is getting wet, but she keeps going like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever going to look down and see the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies while she’s distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is already tilting, and he’s not even paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everything looks from the outside through that window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
